bibl.title: The Iconography of Assimilation: Isis and Royal Imagery on Ptolemaic Seal Impressions.
bibl.note: Isis and the Ptolemaic queen. - Undoing the "Isis knot". - Isis in Edfu. - Queens in vulture headdress.

bibl.title: More than Men, Less than Gods. Studies on Royal Cult and Imperial Worship. Proceedings of the International Colloquium Organized by the Belgian School at Athens (November 1-2, 2007)

bibl.seg: Plantzos Dimitris, The Iconography of Assimilation: Isis and Royal Imagery on Ptolemaic Seal Impressions.

Proceedings of the International Colloquium Organized by the Belgian School at Athens (November 1-2, 2007) = Studia Hellenistica. 51 (Leuven - Paris - Walpole, Mass., 2011) pp. 389-415, 17 figg.
